You can experience large differences in temperature on Tenerife, especially in the winter months- you can swim and sunbathe on the southern beaches, while its freezing and snowing on the summit of Teide.

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: During his trip to Uruguay, Sorin Mihailovici threw a new dart at the world map and hit Cuba in a dreamy setup. This episode represents a refreshing way of looking at things in the beautiful country, which endured too much over the last decades. Sorin starts in Havana and introduces the viewer to the famous classic cars, explaining why they are so many and whats so special about them. He then takes a trip to Vinales, the worlds most-renown area when it comes to producing cigars. You get to see how the high-sought Cuban cigars are made, from start to finish, as Sorin receives unprecedented access to a tobacco plantation and discovers the process of making the cigars, from seeds to consumption. The episode also features a visit to Ernest Hemingways favorite spot in Havana, La Bodeguita del Medio, where the famous American author got inspired to write most of his pieces.

programme.title: Most Intriguing Safari Destinations
programme.desc: Karina visits the awesome Matobo Hills national park. She spends a few days at the magnificent Camp Amalinda, nestled within the caves with the most intriguing character and wonderful views. Karina enjoys Amalindas delectable signature dish. The very knowledgeable guide, Ian Harmer, leads her to one of the many cave painting spectacles. They go in search of the endangered white rhino and have a brush with near heart failure!

programme.title: Most Intriguing Safari Destinations
programme.desc: Karina teams up with another entertaining guide called Barry Wolhuter as they get close to a variety of animals in a hide. With over 35 thousand elephants in the park, Karina experiences hundreds of elephants during happy hour. The Hide offer a very unusual spa treatment! Life seems pretty fragile for a moment as they are confronted with a huge male lion.

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: While blindfolded in Cambodia, Sorin threw the dart at the world map and hit Thailand ("the Land of Smiles"). An incredible journey that spreads throughout two episodes, this adventure features everything you need to know about Thailand and its culture. The first part showcases Bangkok and its crazy good vibe and balances modern times with history. Sorin meets Yvonne, a Brit who came to Thailand to visit the famous River Kwai Bridge, not for tourism, but to track her fathers footsteps. The old man was a Prisoner of War here during the World War II during the bridge building, and now Sorin and his friend are looking for clues about his ordeal. A significant breakthrough takes place.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: Tenerife is the largest and most diverse of the seven Canary Island. It is home to Spains highest mountain - Pico del Teide with an elevation of nearly 4OOO meters. Tenerife includes an incredible ten defined climate zones!!! There are substantial differences between the north and the south of the island. The northern, windward side receives three fourths of all precipitation, which is why it is green year round. The significant differences in elevation also contribute to the great contrasts, as do the mountain ranges extending through the middle of the island. You can experience large differences in temperature on Tenerife, especially in the winter months- you can swim and sunbathe on the southern beaches, while its freezing and snowing on the summit of Teide.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: The European islands are renowned primarily for their hotel resorts. However, we will show you a completely different face of theirs: forests, beaches, coves, mountains, valleys and rivers. Perhaps you will find places that will take your breath away. Why just lie on the beach when there is so much to see? Put on some good hiking shoes, pull your shoelaces tight, and get to know the entire island like the back of your hand.

programme.title: Costa Rica: Wildlife Under the Rainbow
programme.desc: The tropical climate and varied topography of the Costa Rica have fostered exceptional biodiversity, with wildlife from both North and South America. From the peaks of volcanoes down to the Pacific and Caribbean shores, lets discover the life of 90 of the most remarkable mammals, beautiful birds, and astonishing reptiles…

programme.title: Fragrance and Emotions
programme.desc: Unique documentary that takes you to discover the secret of some of the most luxurious perfumes and emblematic fragrances in the world. Visit the famous city of Grasse to meet the creators, the beautiful flower fields and all the incredible emotional powers of the Perfume.

programme.title: The Boy From the Wild
programme.desc: Growing up on a Game Reserve meant to help wildlife get out of captivity, it shares how it began and how Peter Meyer survived some incredible moments in the wild.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: In 1989, CIA operative Kurt Muse was imprisoned at the notorious Carcel Modelo in Panama for his role in organizing radio transmissions against dictator Manuel Noriega. That December, an elite group of the US Delta Force breached the roof of the prison, and one of the most daring close quarter battle operations in history began. From the dramatic helicopter crash and wounding of several Delta operators to the extraction of the entire team by the 5th Infantry Division, this is prime material for CQB analysis. In this episode, CQB recreates the raid, focusing on the "sub-second" reflexes of the Delta Force team from the moment they entered the prison to their extraction from the roof of the prison by an MH-6 "Little Bird" helicopter.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters continue their investigation of Weir Mill and the search for paranormal activity takes a darker turn. Will they finally uncover the truth behind the buildings dark hauntings?

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Ordsall Hall is over 820 years old. It has been put to many uses including a family home, working mens club and church hall. With over 15 hauntings and many sightings, Ordsall Hall will certainly keep the team busy.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Bonjour! Were headed to Quebec Province on todays show. First, we get blown away by the thunderous pipes at Montreals Notre Dame Basilica. After that, we go underneath the city at the Pointe a Calliere archaeology museum. Next, well learn about the native ecosystem at the gigantic, indoor, BioDome. Lastly, well learn about the 1967 Montreal Expo at the structures that are still visited today.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Few people know that Gandhi got his political activist start in South Africa. This is a city where Asia meets Africa and is one of the most diverse cities in the world. Here Journeys encounters people of European, Far Eastern and Indian descent as well as the local Zulus.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: If its rhinos you want to see, you must visit Hluhluwe-Imfolozi Wildlife Park. This huge wilderness area has the highest density of rhino in the world. In addition to the rhino, we locate a pride of lions that is truly amazing. Mkuze National Park is a treasure trove of rare antelope and various other big game. Best of all, there is often no other guests, so this is one of Africas best hidden gems.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Everyday Elements

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Theres a lot to cover in the oldest city in America. Take a sip from the distinctively tasting Fountain of Youth. Then well cross the draw bridge of the undefeated Spanish Fort, the Castillo San Marcos. Then well learn the true history of pirates at the Pirate Museum.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: The city of brotherly love does not disappoint history lovers. We visit Independence hall, the liberty bell, Elfreths alley, the Philadelphia Museum of Art, and get creeped out at Americas first penitentiary, Eastern State.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: For an instrument first developed as recently as the 17th century, the telescope has travelled a long way. The latest version of the once-humble telescope will be going a lot farther - carrying us ever closer to the first light that ever bathed the Universe in which we live.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Stars are a bit like human beings. They can be warm or cold, they come in all kinds of shapes and sizes... and, lets face it, they can be dim or bright. And recent discoveries suggest that the number of stars in our galaxy alone, the Milky Way, may exceed 200 billion. Just what are these citizens of the night sky?

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Over one hundred years ago, two young Argentinian daredevil pilots, Eduardo Bradley and Angel Zuloaga, decided to attempt the first hazardous crossing of the Andes aboard an unreliable balloon. Achieving an altitude of more than 8,000 metres, the pair managed to fly from Chile to Argentina. This docu-series chronicles their adventures and tries to recreate the same journey using the same technique and facing similar challenges.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Diamond River Hunters
programme.desc: The pressure is on to find the big diamond before the winter snow drives the team from the valley. But labour disputes have brought the operation to a halt. A community meeting is called and compromise is reached. The miners agree to pay the labourers directly and employ more people from the local villages. Work resumes at the mine, but overnight 2 accidents occur. The Rhino, their go anywhere off road vehicle has had a spectacular hand brake failure and ramped off a 20 ft cliff. It is a complete write off and will affect the mobility of the team. Warren has also collapsed and fainted, knocking himself unconscious and seriously grazing his face. The altitude and fatigue are wearing him down. Alan is now working the top site, but he has also been gripped by big stone fever and is determined not to leave without finding a large diamond. Kim finds a few small carat stones on the sorting table. Over night the first snow falls and Alan has to rescue his team and equipment from the top site. They get everyone out, but without road access or pumps they cannot continue to mine there. Down in the valley the river freezes over and they are unable to dive or pump. Mining cannot continue and the team has to pull out for the winter. The investors all return to the valley where there is a backlog of over 500 bags to be sorted. It takes two full days to go through all the remaining bags and the team find a number of small diamonds. The diamonds are successfully exported from Lesotho and arrive in Cape Town. A decision will then be made about which stones are to be cut and which will be sold in the rough. Unfortunately some of the bigger stones have faults and impurities in them. The evaluators at E-Diamonds advise Peter to sell most of the parcel uncut, but he is willing to take the risk and cut 20 of the 33 diamonds. The cutting process is risky and the stones are analysed and mapped out on the Saran machine over and over, before the cutting process begins. Carlos, the owner of Clarity Diamonds, is concerned about the faults in the bigger diamonds and worried about the outcome. Once all the stones are cut, they are certified for quality and Carlos delivers them to the investors in Durban. The value of the entire parcel, cut and uncut, is calculated and it turns out they have made a 50% return on their initial investment. The investors are not concerned by their loss, as the experience has been priceless. A geological survey has revealed that there are diamond-bearing pipes under their concession. It is now worth millions of dollars if sold, and the team have the option of returning to the valley and setting up a full-scale diamond mine.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: As scientists and astronomers peer closer at nearby stars with ever more fidelity they are discovering planets; exo planets, worlds outside our own solar system. With technological advances and improved techniques scientists are discovering more and more worlds every day. With confidence scientists now calculated there could be as many as 40 billion Earth like planets in our Milky Way galaxy alone.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We set sail to the land of the Norseman in Oslo, Norway. Well climb the fort walls at Akershus Fortress and discover the North and South Poles at the Fram Museum. Then, well unearth ancient viking ship treasures at the Viking Ship Museum, and well brave the open waters of the Pacific with Thor Heyerdahl at the Kon-tiki museum.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Kad sludinātāja sievaZiemeļkarolīnā tiek atrasta noslepkavota, policijai ir jānoskaidro ne tikai tas, kurš varētu vēlēties viņas nāvi, bet arī tas, vai daži draudzes locekļi sēro vai mēģina slēpt savu daļu vardarbīgajā noziegumā.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti izskata lietu ar juristu un bijušo armijas majoru, kurš tika pakārts par savas sievas saindēšanu ar arsēnu 1921. gadā.

programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.desc: Astoņus gadus veca meitene atklāj, ka viņas māte pēc maiņas Lasvegasas kazino mājās ir nežēlīgi piekauta līdz nāvei. Policija izmanto novērošanas kameru ierakstus, cerot atklāt slepkavas.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Skatītāji tiek iepazīstināti ar Dalijas Dipolito - divdesmit sešus gadus vecās eskorta meitenes - tiesas prāvām, kuras kļuva par bēdīgi slaveno femme fatale un mediju sensāciju. Viņai tika izvirzītas apsūdzības par uzmākšanos sava vīra Maika slepkavībai.

programme.desc: Ģimenes locekļi izmisīgi meklē pazudušu Virdžīnijas pusaudzi, nezinot, ka policijai ir noslēpums: viņi ir atraduši viņa ķermeni, taču atsakās izpaust šo informāciju, jo ir aizdomas par neparastu motīvu.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Saša un Džeremijs izmeklē kāda Notingemas aprūpes nama iemītnieka saindēšanos ar morfiju 1935. gadā, par ko tika notiesāts un pakārts pansionāta īpašnieks.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Slepkava 193 reizes sadur savu uzticīgo tēvu Džefu Raitu un apglabā viņu viņa paša mājas pagalmā. Izmeklētāji pārbauda viņa pagātni, cenšoties atrast vainīgo.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Greizsirdība un apsēstība sasniedz kulmināciju - īpašniecisks narcissists ratiņkrēslā izstrādā metodisku plānu nogalināt savu neko nenojaušošo bijušo draudzeni.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Jauna māte un viņas labākā draudzene tiek nošautas gaišā dienas laikā, izraisot notikumu ķēdi, ko Talsas izmeklētāji nekad nebūtu iedomājušies.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Izmeklētāji saista mirušas sievietes līķi nodegušā transportlīdzeklī ar sazvērestību, kurā iesaistīti divi tiesīgi, augstprātīgi brāļi miljonāri.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Ģimenes locekļi izmisīgi meklē pazudušu Virdžīnijas pusaudzi, nezinot, ka policijai ir noslēpums: viņi ir atraduši viņa ķermeni, taču atsakās izpaust šo informāciju, jo ir aizdomas par neparastu motīvu.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Saša un Džeremijs izmeklē kāda Notingemas aprūpes nama iemītnieka saindēšanos ar morfiju 1935. gadā, par ko tika notiesāts un pakārts pansionāta īpašnieks.

programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Slepkava 193 reizes sadur savu uzticīgo tēvu Džefu Raitu un apglabā viņu viņa paša mājas pagalmā. Izmeklētāji pārbauda viņa pagātni, cenšoties atrast vainīgo.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Policija meklē dīvaina izskata uzbrucēju, kurš redzēts bēgam pēc jaunas mātes nošaušanas. Viņi atklāj aizdomās turamo, kurš nav tas, ko viņi gaida — ar motīvu, kuru nav iespējams aptvert.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Džeremijs un Saša pēta vardarbīgo uzbrukumu un slepkavību pusaudzei Londonas dienvidaustrumos 1918. gadā un to, kā pie viņas ķermeņa atrastā poga un nozīmīte noveda pie bijušā dienesta karavīra notiesāšanas.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Izmisusi sieva zvana uz 911 - viņa ziņo par laupīšanu pēc tam, kad sašautu gultā atradusi savu vīru, trīs bērnu tēvu. Pierādījumi notikuma vietā ātri noved izmeklētājus pie slepkavas.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Manipulatīva sieviete lūdz savam tēvam īstenot viltīgu plānu nogalināt savu bijušo vīru. Vai viņai izdosies pārspēt policiju un izvairīties no cietuma, kamēr tēvs dara viņas netīro darbu?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Pēc neveiksmīga izpirkuma mēģinājuma tiek nogalināti jauns vīrietis un viņa gaidībās esošā līgava. Atlantas slepkavību izmeklētāji neapstāsies savos mēģinājumos identificēt nenotveramo aizdomās turamo.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Nelielā Ohaio pilsētiņā ģimenes aizvainojums par 400 ASV dolāriem beidzas ar dubultslepkavību.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Pēc 50 gadiem Čārlza Mensona stāsts ir kļuvis par leģendu, bet - kas ir fakts un kas izdomājums? Aizmirstiet visu dzirdēto, jo "Helter Skelter" ienirs vēl neizstāstītā stāstā par 20. gadsimta sensacionālāko slepkavību sēriju.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti izmeklē, vai slepkavība kanālmalā 1927. gadā, ko izdarīja kāds vīrietis, kurš uzdevies par policistu, noveda pie tiesas kļūdas. Jaunu pāri apturēja vīrietis, kurš uzdeva sevi par policistu, un pēc tam viņiem uzbruka.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Brutāla un publiska jauna vidusskolnieka saduršana šokē sabiedrību. Policija ātri atklāj noziegumu un motīvu, izmantojot draudīgas balss ziņas un ilgi gruzdošu sāncensību.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Pēc šķiršanās un biznesa bankrota atriebīgs vīrietis nežēlīgi vajā personu, kas, viņaprāt, ir nodarījis pāri. Policijai jāizmanto neparasta taktika, lai palīdzētu nodrošināt šīs personas drošību.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Kad Als bez krekla no kaimiņu zāliena noceļ dīvānu, viņš negaidīti iemanto jaunu reputāciju apkaimes sieviešu vidū. Esot pašpārliecinātam, viņš sāk iet dušā un valkāt elegantas drēbes, un viņa sniegums darbā ievērojami uzlabojas, kā arī veicinās viņa popularitāte starp dāmām. Lieki piebilst, ka Pegija ir greizsirdīga un nemierīga, taču viņa nezina, kā uz to reaģēt - viņas vīrs uzvedas ļoti ne kā Als.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Nogurusi no tā, ka Als pavada viņas randiņus pa durvīm, "pieaugusī" Kellija tiek pie sava dzīvokļa.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks liek Marijai aizvest viņu pie ārsta, taču joka dēļ viņam divas reizes tiek veikta viena un tā pati procedūra; skolā Durbins un Helēna apkauno sevi, un bērni sacenšas par klases augstākajiem tituliem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Skola gatavojas ziemas brīvlaikam. Džeks mēģina ierakstīt lekciju cenšoties pavērt ceļu uz Viskonsinas Universitātes filozofijas nodaļu; neapmierināts un nespējot pabeigt video, viņš aizmieg un sāk sapņot murgus.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Skrentonas filiāle izveido komiteju, lai atrastu nākamo priekšnieku, taču intervēto personu loks izrādās mazāk nekā iespaidīgs. Dvaits pieprasa interviju, neskatoties uz viņa negadījumu ar ieroci.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Roberts joprojām atgūstas no situācijas ar vērsi. Viņš uzzina, ka viņam jāpavada vēl trīs nedēļas kopā ar Frenku un Mariju, pirms varēs pārvākties atpakaļ uz savu dzīvokli. Viņš ir kaprīzs un izturas augstprātīgi. Debra cenšas savu dzimšanas dienu padarīt svinīgu.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Klāt tas mēneša laiks, kad Debra un Rejs staigā pa olu čaumalām, lai izvairītos no garastāvokļa svārstībām. Roberta, Frenka un velnu mudināts, Rejs nopērk tabletes, kurām vajadzētu uzlabot viņas garastāvokli. Debra nav apmierināta.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Atgriezies skolotājs nozog Kema slavu viņa organizētajās dejās. Mičels atklāj, ka viņa jaunais priekšnieks ir ļauns. Heilija kopā ar Filu dodas uz balvu pasniegšanas ceremoniju. Džejs un Glorija cenšas panākt, lai Lilija atzīstas.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Glorija un Klēra ved Liliju pirkt kleitu. Džejs māca Lūkam kokapstrādi. Kamerons mēģina izkļūt no muzeja ceļojuma. Fils palīdz Endijam izveidot video savai draudzenei, kas Heilijas ieskatā ir tizli.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Roberts ir atguvis spēku un ir kopā ar Eimiju. Bet kaut kas joprojām nav kārtībā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Atskats uz laiku, kad Roberts izšķīrās.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Jaunais Dunder Mifflin izpilddirektors Roberts Kalifornija atstājis lapu, kuras vidū ir līnija. Tās abās pusēs ir darbinieku vārdi, liekot ikvienam mēģināt saprast, ko tas nozīmē.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Pakļaujoties Roberta spiedienam palielināt pārdošanas apjomu, Endijs piedāvā personāla stimulēšanas programmu. Tā viņam atspēlējas, kad viņš piedāvā ļoti personisku galveno balvu.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kamēr tiek atkāts Entonija noslēpums, Helēnai ar Durbina palīdzību jāpārvar veipošanas problēma.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Kamēr pārējā pilsēta gatavojas Toledo ikgadējā Keitijas Holmas dienas svinībām, Džeks un Marisa plāno sabojāt svētku konkursu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Ceļojumā uz Lasvegasu Džejs mēģina dabūt labāku istabu. Klēra mēģina atgūt pagājušajā gadā zaudēto naudu. Fils cenšas iekļūt burvju klubā, bet Kamerons izvēlas vecpuišu ballīti, nevis spa dienu kopā ar Mičelu.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Džeja plāni organizēt ģimenes vakaru ir nogājuši no sliedēm. Fils nonāk grūtībās, mēģinot pārdot Glorijas veco dzīvokli. Mičels neapstiprina Kamerona tēva radīto kāzu elementu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Ala tēvocis vecpuisis pēc nāves atstājis 500 000 dolārus pirmajam no saviem radiniekiem, kas dzemdēts viņa vārdā nosauktu jaundzimušo. Als pārvar savu ierasto nepatiku pret seksu ar Pegu. Viņam nezinot, viņa slepeni turpina lietot tabletes, lai Als turpinātu gribēt seksu. Viņa nolēmusi, ka trešā grūtniecība nav to vērta.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc dzeršanas baņķieru ballītē Mārsija atklāj, ka ir precējusies ar noslēpumainu Džefersonu DArsiju, kuru Als redz kā žigolo un blēdi. Lai Mārsija justos labāk par šīm negaidītajām pārmaiņām savā dzīvē, Pegija nolemj organizēt Mārsijas un Džefersona oficiālu kāzu ceremoniju Bandiju pagalmā. Šajā ceremonijā nekas nenotiek, kā plānots.

programme.title: Ofiss

programme.desc: Pakļaujoties Roberta spiedienam palielināt pārdošanas apjomu, Endijs piedāvā personāla stimulēšanas programmu. Tā viņam atspēlējas, kad viņš piedāvā ļoti personisku galveno balvu.

programme.title: Bruklina
programme.desc: Komēdijseriāls seko detektīva Džeika Peralta un viņa daudzveidīgo un jauko kolēģu piedzīvojumiem Ņujorkas policijas 99. iecirknī.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Marijas dzimšanas dienā ģimene dodas uz Itāliju. Rejs saaukstējas un jūtas nelaimīgs. Roberts atrod savu sapņu sievieti. Bet - vispirms viņam jātiek pāri viņas tēvam.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Šovs Itālijā turpinās. Rejs sāk novērtēt Itāliju, un Robertam, ja viņš vēlas tikties rīt, ir jāizvairās no Stefānijas tēva.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Kad viss noliktavas personāls uzvar loterijā un pamet darbu, Derils kļūst nomākts un pieprasa sevis atlaišanu. Savukārt biroja darbinieki ir spiesti paši kraut kravas automašīnu saviem pasūtījumiem.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Endijs stāsta, ka rīko dārza ballīti Dvaita fermā ar mērķi atstātu labu iespaidu uz Robertu Kaliforniju, taču viņš to patiesībā dara, lai iegūtu savu vecāku atzinību - viņi, šķiet, dod priekšroku viņa jaunākajam brālim.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Sezona sākās ar uzstādījumu, kas pazīstams daudziem Vidusrietumu studentiem: tornado treniņiem. Ideja izvairīties no tornado varenā spēka, pulcējoties gaitenī un cerot, ka tas jūs nepamanīs, ir potenciāls perfektiem kumēdiņiem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks liek skolēniem izveidot viltus kultu, lai sabotētu direktora Durbina jaunās skolas formas; Mērija, Stefa un Mišela gatavojas redzēt vienu no saviem iecienītākajiem māksliniekiem, kurš ieradies pilsētā.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Ģimene pievienojas Filam Austrālijā, kur viņš izpilda savas mirušās mātes vēlmi uzzināt, kur viņa vecāki pavadīja medusmēnesi.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils salaidis grīstē mājsaimniecības uzdevumus, un nu viņam jāstāsta smalki meli Klērai. Glorija ir atbildīga par ģimenes portretu, bet Džejs ar Stellu piedalās suņu izstādē.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad Kellija sāk tikties ar ietekmīgu pilsētas vietvaras pārstāvi, Als kļūst par apkārtnes bosu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Stāsts no Baka viedokļa - viņš bēg no mājas, jūtoties atstāts novārtā. Aiz ēdnīcas viņš paņem suni, kuru atved mājās. Viņš ātri to nožēlo, jo jaunais suns tiek pie visas Bada un Kellijas uzmanības. Tikmēr Als ir apsēsts ar to, kā no Viskonsinas restorāna nogaršot savu iecienītāko ķiršu siera kūku.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.desc: Marija un Frenks ar savu automašīnu ietriecas Reja mājā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Roberts pastāsta Eimijai par Stefāniju, jo domā, ka viņiem ir lemts būt kopā. Vēl viena šķiršanās.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Erina ir noraizējusies, ka viņa drīzumā tiks atlaista - viņa Robertam un viņa dēlam organizē postošu Helovīna ballīti birojā. Roberts pārbauda darbinieku prātus, lai izdomātu perfektu spokainu stāstu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Dvaits biroja datoros uzinstalē "Pastardienas iekārtu", kas var atlaist visus darbiniekus, ja viņi pieļauj pārāk daudz kļūdu. Tikmēr Geibs mēģina saieties ar vienu no Darila noliktavas darbiniekiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Seriāls ir par diviem brāļiem — Čārliju un Alanu —, kas kopīgiem spēkiem audzina Alana dēlu Džeiku. Alans ir šķīries no sievas un pārcēlies dzīvot pie Čārlija, kas rada daudz komisku situāciju.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Forsaiti
programme.desc: Soames pasūta Filam izolētas lauku mājas būvniecību, neskatoties uz Irēnas teikto, ka viņu laulība būtu jāuzskata par neizdevušos. Džoilons dodas pie Luīzas, bet Annai piedzimst vēl viens mazdēls.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids aptaujā ekscentriskus kaimiņus un uzzina par noslēpumainā zēna talantiem. Terēza turpina izmeklēšanu vienatnē, bet Žans Pjērs risina pagātnes problēmas un satiek Filipu.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija tiek uzaicinātas palīdzēt policijai kā konsultantes un atklāj kādu svarīgu saikni starp slepkavībām.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka kāda vīra nāve ir saistīta ar līdzekļu izšķērdēšanu hidroelektrostacijas projektā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks zina, ka Takera slepkavību organizēja Tonijs Petruči, tomēr situāciju saasina gangstera bēgšana.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Slavens burvju mākslinieks ir kā iekritis akā. Visa Londona apspriež šo noslēpumu, un kāda avīze nolīgst Elīzu veikt izmeklēšanu, neskatoties uz to, ka pie šīs lietas jau strādā Hercogs.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Tristans palīdz Zigfrīdam ar sarežģītu klientu un atgādina par to, kāds kādreiz bija viņš pats. Džeimss cer, ka pavasara ballē notikumi ar Helēnu virzīsies uz priekšu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc modeles Bārbijas Džounsas un modes dizaineres Florences Astores dubultslepkavībām Peregrīna izmanto savas nepārbaudītās un neparastās prasmes, lai mēģinātu notvert viņu slepkavu, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: 1850-tie gadi: bezbailīgā un ziņkārīgā Miss Skārleta vada tēva detektīvaģentūru ar inspektora Velingtona (Hercoga), kalpones Aivijas un Mozus palīdzību.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Jaunas atraitnes liktenis rada sarežģījumus Džeimsa un Helēnas romantiskajās attiecībās, bet Trikija Vū apmeklējums izraisa haosu Skeldeilā.

programme.desc: Kāds draugs Dalgliešu uzaicina uz Dorsetu, kur viņš noskaidro, ka draugs un kāds netālu esošā pansionāta iedzīvotājs nesen tika noslepkavoti. Dalgliešs ir pārliecināts, ka nāves ir saistītas.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Kāds draugs Dalgliešu uzaicina uz Dorsetu, kur viņš noskaidro, ka draugs un kāds netālu esošā pansionāta iedzīvotājs nesen tika noslepkavoti. Dalgliešs ir pārliecināts, ka nāves ir saistītas.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Šajā sezonā varoņus gaidīs daudz piedzīvojumu. Brekenrīds un Mērdoks piedalīsies skotu spēlēs, Krebtrijam būs jādodas glābt savu tēvu un nāksies sastapties ar senu ienaidnieku, un Terenss Maierss lūgs Mērdoka palīdzību, kad būs apdraudēts premjera amata kandidāts. Bet viena no sērijām pirmo reizi būs uzņemta mūzikla stilā.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimss iegādājas rentgena iekārtu, neskatoties uz Zigfrīda iebildumiem. Zigfrīda romantiskie piedzīvojumi satrauc cieminiekus, Dženija piesakās māsu skolā, apbēdinot Helēnu un Ričardu.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Kad Gvenda Holideja ievācas savā sapņu mājoklī, viņa sāk redzēt spokus. Pēc tam atklājas, ka Gvenda uzauga šajā namā — un mistērija kļūst draudīgāka.

programme.desc: Attālā Francijas viesnīcā Elīza seko kādam krāpniekam. Viņa uzskata, ka beidzot ir notvērusi Skotlendjarda vismeklētāko noziedznieku. Tomēr arī citi viesnīcas viesi vēlas saņemt solīto atlīdzību.

programme.desc: Džeimsam ir jānokārto veci rēķini, kad Daroubijā atgriežas pazīstama seja, un Tristanam un Zigfrīdam ir jāatzīst savstarpējās atšķirības.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija ir nonākušas līdz savu spēju robežai, jo visiem ir alibi. Vai izdosiet uzzināt, kurš nogalināja seru Pīteru, pirms cieš vēl kāds cits?

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Gatavošanās kāzām kļūst par haosu, kad līgavas tēvu atrod mirušu rītā, kad jānotiek ceremonijai starp divu naidīgu ģimeņu locekļiem.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimss iegādājas rentgena iekārtu, neskatoties uz Zigfrīda iebildumiem. Zigfrīda romantiskie piedzīvojumi satrauc cieminiekus, Dženija piesakās māsu skolā, apbēdinot Helēnu un Ričardu.

programme.title: European Qualifiers 2026. FIFA World Cup 26 Play-Off Draw
Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: В последний раз прощаюсь
programme.desc: Жарким летним днём 24-летний Андрей спасает тонущую школьницу Веру. Девушка безответно влюбляется в своего спасителя, а тот видит в ней лишь маленькую застенчивую девчонку. Вскоре Андрей уезжает в город и женится на своей ровеснице.

programme.title: В последний раз прощаюсь
programme.desc: Жарким летним днём 24-летний Андрей спасает тонущую школьницу Веру. Девушка безответно влюбляется в своего спасителя, а тот видит в ней лишь маленькую застенчивую девчонку. Вскоре Андрей уезжает в город и женится на своей ровеснице.

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: Summer Dreams
programme.desc: Seventeen-year old Robbie Zirpollo has a problem. As the film opens, his mother is driving him to his new summer job. We learn that Robbie has grown up in Oceanside, California, but now he and his mother have moved to Colorado for a fresh start, as his father has taken the familys savings and his secretary to Mexico. Robbies mom has, through an uncle, gotten him a summer job at Water World on the grounds crew. The adventure begins when Robbie meets Alex and gets moved to Aokees Surf and Snack shack to work. Alex convinces Robbie to enter the parks "Employee Olympics" to bring the Surfer King trophy to its rightful place among the concessions crew. Tiffany, the park owners daughter, has other ideas for Robbie.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: One More Time
programme.desc: Lucia is an aging Italian actress and director (beautifully portrayed by Antonionis and Fellinis actress Lucia Bosa), decides to come back to the small town where she had spent her happy childhood. She wants to bring the TV where television has never been seen before. She reaches out to the women in the local community with a project that might change their lives forever.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Based on Olivier Adams bestselling novel, "Des Vents Contraires," it tells the story of Paul. Since his wife, Sarah, disappeared without a trace, Paul lives alone with his two young children. But a year has passed, a year in which he had to reinvent himself every day—and Paul is exhausted.

programme.title: My Son, My Son, What Have Ye Done
programme.desc: Inspired by a true crime, a man begins to experience mystifying events that lead him to slay his mother with a sword.

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: Unexpected
programme.desc: Bob and Amy are at a crossroads: she wants to adopt a child, he doesnt. Will renovating their house and rescuing animals solve their problems? Will their new handyman and his sons pregnant girlfriend be the miracle theyre looking for?...

programme.title: Crossing Point
programme.desc: The girlfriend of a couple vacationing in Baja is kidnapped by a drug dealer who demands that her boyfriend smuggle back cocaine into the US or she will be killed.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their town is up for sale, crafty Irish villagers scheme to raise the money to prevent the buy-out...

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: True Smile
programme.desc: Sergio, a 26-year-old autistic male is blind and has never seen a smile. He does, however, give everybody a sincere smile every day. A documentary based on the amazing story encapsulated by Sergio Aznarez Rosados life.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: Wake
programme.desc: When things get tough for offbeat Carys Reitman, she does what any emotionally isolated, modern girl would do - she goes to strangers funerals. At one fateful funeral, she unexpectedly meets Tyler, a man mourning his fiancee. Despite the warnings of her undertaker best friend Shane and her roommate Lila, she finds herself connecting to someone for the first time. Searching for answers, Carys goes to see her estranged mother to confront her past. And as she tries to open herself to the risks of love with Tyler, she realizes she may have more to fear than just a broken heart.

programme.title: Land Of the Blind
programme.desc: A soldier recounts his relationship with a famous political prisoner attempting to overthrow their countrys authoritarian government.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: The Phantom Father
programme.desc: The Phantom Father tells a story of an American professor Robert Traum, who takes a sabbatical from his teaching job to trace his roots in Romania. Traum soon discovers that he comes from a wealthy family involved in organized crime. He manages to reestablish contact with the sole remaining link to his otherwise deceased family—Sami. Rocco Castoro, the editor-in-chief of VICE magazine called the movie the best Romanian movie hes ever seen.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: A mother falls for a younger man while her daughter falls in love for the first time. Mother Nature messes with their fates.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Donijs Darko

programme.title: Vilciens uz Jumu
programme.desc: 19. gadsimta beigās Arizonā tiek sagūstīts dzelzceļa laupītāju bandas vadonis Bens Veids. Pilsoņu kara veterāns un rančo īpašnieks Dens Evanss piesakās nogādāt bīstamo slepkavu uz vilcienu, kas dosies uz Jūmu, kur noziedznieku gaida tiesa. Ceļā Evanss un Veids, kas katrs pārstāv ļoti atšķirīgas pasaules, iemanto viens otra cieņu. Taču Veida banda un uz katra soļa draudošās briesmas padara to par nežēlīgu un neiespējamu katra vīra ceļu pretī savam liktenim.

programme.title: Valkīra
programme.desc: 1944. gada 20. jūlija slepkavības un politiskā apvērsuma dramatizējums, ko Otrā pasaules kara laikā veica izmisīgi renegāti Vācijas armijas virsnieki pret Ādolfu Hitleru.

programme.title: Amerikāņu afēra
programme.desc: Filmas sižeta pamatā ir septiņdesmito gadu beigās reāli notikusi speciālā operācija "Abscam", kuras laikā, lai noķertu zagtu mantu tirgoņus, bija paredzēts viņu vidē iefiltrēt FIB aģentus. Operācija izvērtās par korupcijas perēkli visos līmeņos...

programme.title: Paspēt laikā
programme.desc: Topošais tētis Pīters atrodas uz nervu sabrukuma robežas, kā arī vairāku tūkstošu kilometru attālumā no savas sievas, kurai ir palikušas piecas dienas līdz bērna nākšanai pasaulē. Un Pītera nerviem galīgi nenāk par labu apstāklis, ka garajā un neprātīgajā ceļojumā, kas viņam būs jāveic, par viņa kompanjonu kļūst godkārīgais aktieris Ītans.

programme.title: Patvērums
programme.desc: Kērtiss Laforšs kopā ar sievu Samantu un nedzirdīgo meitiņu Hannu dzīvo nelielā Ohaio pilsētā. Naudas ir maz, turklāt Hannai ir nepieciešama īpaša medicīniskā aprūpe un izglītība. Tomēr par spīti visam Kērtiss un Samanta mīl viens otru, un visi kopā viņi ir laimīga ģimene. Kad Kērtiss redz šausminošus sapņus par katastrofālus plūdus nesošu vētru, viņš nolemj mazināt satraukumu, ceļot patvertni ģimenes mājas pagalmā. Rezultātā sarežģās viņa attiecības ar sievu.

programme.title: Mans draugs zombijs
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad ļoti neparasts zombijs izglābj vēl dzīvu meiteni no uzbrukuma, abi izveido attiecības, kas aizsāk visu nedzīvo pasauli pārveidojošus notikumus.

programme.title: 2001: Kosmosa Odiseja
programme.desc: Uz Mēness tiek atklāts noslēpumains artefakts. Tā dēļ uz Jupiteru tiek nosūtīts kosmosa kuģis, kur divi cilvēki un viens superdators mēģinās noskaidrot šī objekta izcelsmi.

programme.title: Es gribu tevi atpakaļ
programme.desc: Nupat kā par vientuļniekiem kļuvušie trīsdesmitgadnieki Pīters un Emma nolēmuši sadarboties, lai sabotētu savu bijušo jaunās attiecības un atgūtu viņus uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Non-Stop: tiešais reiss
programme.desc: Transatlantiskā avioreisa Ņujorka_Londona laikā ASV aviācijas policijas priekšnieks Bils Marks saņem vairākas īsziņas ar prasību pārskaitīt 150 miljonus dolāru uz kādu ārzonu kontu. Pretējā gadījumā tiek draudēts ik pēc 20 minūtēm nogalināt kādu pasažieri. Kad atklājas, ka konts ir atvērts uz paša Marka vārda, viņš tiek turēts aizdomās par lidmašīnas nolaupīšanu.

programme.title: Nebraska
programme.desc: Režisors Aleksandrs Peins, kura veidotās filmas vienmēr bijušas zīmīgas ar izjustu cilvēcīgumu un stāstu, kas uzrunā plašas auditorijas, ar jaunāko filmu "Nebraska" atgriežas pie reiz aizsāktās novecošanas un vientulības tēmām. Sirmgalvja tēva un laika gaitā atsvešinājušā dēla atkaliepazīšanās stāsts tiek uzskatīts par režisora līdz šim aizkustinošāko un labāko darbu.

programme.desc: Izmeklētājs iepazīstas ar vīrieša nāvi kalnos. Mēģinot atšķetināt noziegumu, viņš sastop mirušā vīrieša noslēpumaino sievu.

programme.title: Sieva
programme.desc: To zina ikviens: aiz katra diža vīrieša vienmēr stāv diža sieviete. Džoana Kāslmena ir slavena Ņujorkas rakstnieka sieva. Savulaik viņa bija sava nākamā vīra studente un rakstīja itin labus stāstus, ar viņu pat saistījās noteiktas cerības. Apstākļu sakritība mainīja sievietes nolūkus - viņas profesionālais ceļš ir veidot karaļus. Sliktākajā gadījumā - Nobela prēmijas laureātus.

programme.title: Suņu sala
programme.desc: Kad pēc korumpētā mēra pavēles visi Megasaki pilsētas suņi tiek nosūtīti dzīvot uz vientuļas salas, 12 gadus veco Atari vienatnē dodas glābt savu uzticamo suni Spotu. Kopā ar pārējiem suņiem viņš uzsāk krusta gājienu pret korumpēto mēru.

programme.title: Privilēģijas būt vienam
programme.desc: Jautrs un aizkustinošs stāsts par pusaudžu problēmām, kura pamatā ir Stīvena Čobska tāda paša nosaukuma bestsellers, kas jau kļuvis par mūsdienu klasiku. Romāns aizraujoši un patiesi attēlo kāpumus un kritumus pusaudža ceļā uz pilngadību.

programme.title: Kāzas Meksikā
programme.desc: Divi rūdīti vientuļnieki - Frenks un Lindsija - ir ielūgti uz vienām un tām pašām kāzām. Dīvainā kārtā viņi visur sagadās kopā: gan lidmašīnā, gan blakus numuriņos viesnīcā, gan pie kāzu galda.

programme.title: Lielās cerības
programme.desc: 19. gadsimta sākuma Londona. Ar noslēpumaina labdara palīdzību nabadzīgais jauneklis Pips, kas uzaudzis bez vecākiem, negaidīti iekļūst Londonas smalkajās aprindās. Jaunajā džentlmeņa statusā viņš uzmeklē Estellu - daiļo bagātas ģimenes atvasi, ko iemīlējis vēl būdams mazs puika. Taču, ja kāds atklātu viņa patieso pagātni, sagrautu jauno cilvēku un visu, kas viņam dārgs...

programme.title: Manis te nav
programme.desc: Kāds vīrietis cīnās ar traģiskām pagātnes atmiņām, cenšoties izprast savu tagadni. Tomēr drīz vien viņš apjauš, ka laiks nav tāds ienaidnieks, par kādu viņš to uzskata.

programme.title: Ofēlija
programme.desc: Vai varat iztēloties Hamleta stāstu no Ofēlijas skatpunkta? Šī ir filma, kas parādīs tieši šādu perspektīvu. Ophelija ir tāda vecuma, kā karaliene Ģertrūde, kas gaida, un viņas vienīgais gars uztver Hamletas simpātijas. Tā kā iekāre un nodevība apdraud valstību, Ofēlija nonāk ieslodzījumā starp patiesu mīlestību un sava likteņa kontroli.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Holiday Gingerbread Showdown
programme.desc: Three bakers compete to win a mammoth $25,000 by creating spectacular gingerbread cakes based on a scene from a famous movie in this scrumptious cooking show. After being given their respective scenes which they must replicate as perfectly as possible, the judges will asses their edible creations and decide who has impressed the most. These delectable showpieces are as extravagant as they are intricate, with the bakers meticulously detailing each aspect of their respective scenes. One baker will be selected to compete in the finale, where they will have a chance of winning the whopping cash prize.

programme.title: Best Bite In Town
programme.desc: Tulsa. Noah Cappe, Aarti Sequeira and Joe Sasto to explore Italian and Caribbean cuisine, banh mi, delicatessen fare and elevated cowboy cooking in Tulsa, Oklahoma.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon celebrates his wife, Liz, using her favourite flavour, lemon! He prepares lemon ricotta ravioli with cacio e pepe sauce.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon prepares for a barbecue encore, Cleveland style, with a classic Ohio sandwich, crunchy-creamy fries and a portable pie.

programme.title: Zoe Bakes
programme.desc: Inspired by the flavours and fun at the Minnesota State Fair, Zoë makes an angel food cake with a cherry studded whipped topping and orange cream pops.

programme.title: Zoe Bakes
programme.desc: Zoë is hosting a celebration to honour one of her mentors and makes a grand, multi-tiered chiffon cake infused with coffee and honeycomb candy.

programme.title: Selena + Chef: Home For the Holidays
programme.desc: Selena Gomez rings in the new year with Chef Eric Adjepong. Selenas skills are tested as she tackles shrimp and banana grits, scallop benedict, and malva pudding.

programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat
programme.desc: Bobby Flays best friend, Iron Chef Michael Symon, enters the Triple Threat kitchen. But friendship doesnt stop Bobby from making this a fair fight!

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.
